name: Event Causalis
description:
Made during 2021 Epic Megajam

The Big Rip is near. The ever expanding universe will soon disintegrate!

Only way to stop it? 

To initiate Event Causalis and stop the flow of time.

Team up with your past self and reach for Event Causalis before everything is destoryed.

CONTROLS -

WASD - Movement

SPACEBAR - Jump

F - Switch Character

C - Swith view, Hold to switch perspective

R - Restart Level
